import React from "react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; const RecCard = { offScreen: { opacity: 0, }, onScreen: { opacity: 1, rotate: [0, 90, 0, -45, 0], y: { duration: 0.4, yoyo: Infinity, ease: "ease", delay: 2, }, transition: { type: "spring", bounce: 0.4, duration: 2 }, }, }; function ReccomendedList() { return (
); } export default ReccomendedList;
